subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Olympic Games
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mr. O’Brien won three Olympic medals (two gold) and became the first man to reach 59, 60, 61, 62 and 63 feet.
snippet: Mr. O’Brien won three Olympic medals (two gold) and became the first man to reach 59, 60, 61, 62 and 63 feet.
